notes.text: In nontechnical contexts koala bear (as opposed to koala) is widely used. Zoologists, however, regard this form as incorrect on the grounds that, despite appearances, koalas are completely unrelated to bears

crossReferenceMarkers: Also called native bear in Australia
definitions: a bearlike arboreal Australian marsupial that has thick gray fur and feeds on eucalyptus leaves.

notes.text: Phascolarctos cinereus, the only member of the family Phascolarctidae

shortDefinitions: Australian marsupial that has thick grey fur and feeds on eucalyptus leaves
